title: Coinbase CEO: Banking Lobbyists Are Trying to Ban Their Competition
full_text: Coinbase CEO: Banking Lobbyists Are Trying to Ban Their Competition. Bank lobbyists and crypto lobbyists are publicly fighting over new legislation. Lawmakers are noticeably absent from the debate.. One of the major topics of background discussion at the 2026 edition of the World Economic Forum meeting in Davos, Switzerland, has been the showdown between the crypto industry and traditional banks… [+6422 chars]
